attributes.action: Don’t shorten the summer holidays to 4 weeks
attributes.additional_details: Stop this from happening, if possible even increase some holidays.
attributes.background: It has been said that school holidays might be shortened to 4 weeks, which is way too low for students already struggling with the load of work set for them.

rejection.details: The Government has not announced any plans to reduce the length of school summer holidays in England, so we're not sure what you want the Government or Parliament to do.
